Package com.example.carturestibackend.controllers

Class RegistrationController

java.lang.Object
com.example.carturestibackend.controllers.RegistrationController
@Controller public class RegistrationController extends Object
Controller class for handling user registration-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • showRegistrationForm

      @GetMapping("/register") public String showRegistrationForm()
      Displays the registration form.
      Returns:
      The name of the HTML template to render.

    • registerUser

      @PostMapping("/register") public String registerUser(@RequestParam("name") String name, @RequestParam("address") String address, @RequestParam("email") String email, @RequestParam("password") String password, @RequestParam("age") int age, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the user.
      address - The address of the user.
      email - The email of the user.
      password - The password of the user.
      age - The age of the user.
      model - The Model object to add attributes.
      Returns:
      The name of the HTML template to render.

    • checkUserExists

      @PostMapping("/checkuser2") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> checkUserExists(@RequestBody Map<String,String> request)
      Checks if a user exists by email.
      Parameters:
      request - The request body containing the email.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with status CONFLICT if user exists, otherwise OK.
